article_title: Though convenience draws customers, Chattanooga area banks are closing branches

article_metadata.description: The total number of bank branches in metropolitan Chattanooga declined by 7.3 percent from 2009 to 2013 and will decline even more this year as consumers and banks shift more of their bank transactions from traditional brick-and-mortar offices to mobile and electronic devices.
